fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- **Elderly Wisdom**: Select a player and guess their role. if correct, draw a Heal! (20). cannot guess the same role twice, a Revealed role, or a Teammate role. (Infinite uses)
- **Meditation**: Heal yourself 1, 2, or 3 health. Cannot heal the same # twice. 3 uses, (3 uses, 2 night cooldown.)
- **Tortoise and the Hare**: You may play a Teleport! (36) on any player. Unlike a regular Teleport, you may ignore the range requirement. (3 uses.)
- **Slow**: Select a player. They will be notified that they have been slowed by the Turtle Witch. All effects of their abilities will be delayed by 1 night for the rest of the game until you die. (2 uses.)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - **Around for Eons**: You may start with a card set of your choosing. No special cards!
